mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Review (board_id, content, memberId) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{content}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.board_id boardId, r.content, r.inserted, FROM Review r JOIN Member m ON r.memberId = m.id WHERE r.board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY r.id
SELECT id, board_id boardId, content, memberId, inserted FROM Review WHERE id = #{id}
